content.question: Which of the following best describes the motion of the object?

choices.label: The object is either speeding up or slowing down the entire time.
The object starts and finishes at the same position.
The object travels in the same direction for the entire time.
The object undergoes positive acceleration the entire time.

content.answer: The object travels in the same direction for the entire time.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
